detail_desc: Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Wide V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with an embroidered pattern and decorated with embroidered ribbon. Double ties with tassels at the neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Imitation suede elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy, washed denim with an extra-high waist, detachable D-ring belt and zip fly with a button. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim and a small stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
V-neck body in jersey with embroidery at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and high cut at the back.
Long tulle skirt with beaded embroidery and a smocked waist. Lined with a shorter jersey skirt.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed, printed denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.
Lightly padded, fleece-lined all-in-one suit with a lined hood, buttons at the top and concealed press-studs at the sides.
Lace blouse with raw edges, a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a deep V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim Fit.

Set in a soft, fine knit with mittens and a jacquard-patterned hat and blanket. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Hat with a pompom on top and ribbed hem. Blanket with ribbed edges. Size of blanket 65x65 cm. The set is supplied in a gift box with a satin ribbon.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Patterned bikini. Top with a lined front and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Fully lined bottoms with a flounce at the top.
Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and press-stud cuffs.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Shorts in crocheted lace made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist, decorative bow at the front and side pockets. Jersey lining.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Shorts in a viscose and linen weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly and diagonal side pockets.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a large faux fur pompom on the top.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a ventilating mesh section at the top. Integral sports bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, an elastic hem and a racer back with a cut-out section. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose crêpe weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top and decorative tie belt.

Ankle boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge, elastic laces and adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details, mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Scarf in softly draping, patterned satin.
Trousers in soft fleece with contrasting colour details, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Short skirt in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend. Elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Sunglasses with glittery plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long cardigan knitted in soft bouclé yarn containing some wool. Long sleeves and no buttons.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a chest pocket.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length skirt in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. High, elasticated waist and a wide rib-knit section at the hem with a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.

Base layer set with a top and pair of tights in soft, fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for optimal comfort. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Tights with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a frill trim at the back, a detachable belt with D-rings, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Nursing blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and practical jersey inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated hem.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Shorts in soft cotton piqué with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets, a fake flap pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Wide top in soft, gently draping silk with a round neckline and covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a covered button, and ties at the hem that can be wrapped around and tied at the waist.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a round neck, embroidery detail at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, knee-length lace dress with a V-neck front and back and short cap sleeves. Partly lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Sandals in leather with square toes, covered block heels and narrow straps that wind and tie around the ankle. Leather linings and insoles and finely fluted rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist (except in sizes 12-14+Y), a zip fly and button and lace-trimmed hems with short slits in the sides.
Short dressing gown in satin with a lace yoke at the back and on the shoulders, short, wide sleeves with a lace trim, and a tie belt at the waist.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and one narrow shoulder strap.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lightly padded cups with removable inserts and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch. Pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Short-sleeved dress in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a visible zip at the back, front pockets and a detachable braided belt in imitation suede. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
